markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a building in [Tikawara](/tikawara/) and the center of its religious life.

## Background

A shrine dedicated to [Ngati](/ngati/), the [Huana](/huana/) representation of [Ondra](/ondra/).

## Characters

* [Nairi](/nairi/), priestess of Tikawara.

## Gallery

</gallery>
